metadata.title: CVE-2024-24858 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: A race condition was found in the Linux kernel's net/bluetooth in{conn,adv}_{min,max}_interval_set() function. This can result in I2capconnection or broadcast abnormality issue, possibly leading to denial ofservice.

criterions.comment: linux package in trusty/esm is affected and may need fixing.
